alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:38PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Crittenden, northwestern DeSoto and central Shelby Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 638 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunset, or near Marion, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Marion, Millington, T O Fuller State Park, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Walls, Edmondson, Sunset, Anthonyville, Jericho, Southwest Memphis, Ellendale, Simsboro, Whitehaven and Frayser. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
